testCase.name: [components] - CartItem should render component
[components] - QuantitySelector should render component
[components] - QuantitySelector should have initial default Quantity = 1
[components] - QuantitySelector should disable decrease button(-) when Quantity = 1
[components] - QuantitySelector should call onIncrease action when user clicks on Increase(+) button
[components] - QuantitySelector should call onDecrease action when user clicks on Decrease(-) button and Quantity > 1
[components] - QuantitySelector should display qty label
[components] Product Card Component Default Product Card should render title
[components] Product Card Component Default Product Card should render price
[components] Product Card Component Default Product Card should render product image
[components] Product Card Component Default Product Card should render rating component
[components] Product Card Component Default Product Card when not providing rating prop should show empty rating
[components] Product Card Component Sale Price Product Card should render sale price text
[components] Product Card Component Rating Product Card should render rating component with provided rating value
[components] Product Card Component No Image Product Card should render default Image placeholder
[components] Product Card Component Product Card Skeleton should render Product Card skeleton
[components] - FacetItem should render component
[components] - FacetItem should expand accordian when user clicks on summery and shrinks again when user clicks again

[components] - FacetItem should show "View More" when number of items > 6
[components] - FacetItem should show "View Less" when user clicks on "View More" and "View More" when clicks again

[component] CategroyNestedNavigation component should render only the category-list items where list property isDisplayed is true

[component] CategroyNestedNavigation component should call onCategoryClickMock if childrenCategories are empty
